text: Pfullendorf is a town in Sigmaringen in Baden-Württemberg in Germany. About 13,000 people live there. It is 25 km² north of Lake Constance. This area is called the Linzgau. It was a Free Imperial City from 1220 to 1803. == References == Category:Imperial free cities Category:Sigmaringen (district)
title: Pfullendorf
